DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine the effectiveness of different training programs on outcomes in persons with spinal cord injury (SCI). We are interested to see which programs have the greatest impact.
DOC.brief_title: Training Programs to Improve Outcomes for Individuals With Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.criteria: 18 to 75 years old Use either a power or manual wheelchair as a primary means of mobility (>50% of weekly mobility) Living in the community Must have a nonprogressive spinal cord injury Manual wheelchair users must be able to independently propel their wheelchairs Manual wheelchair users score â‰¤90 on the Wheelchair Skills Training Questionnaire (WSTQ) Cognitive impairment that could interfere with learning
